summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5803 for the improvement of 24th Avenue South, from Columbian Way to Ferdinand Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76488 as amended by Ordinance No. 76840 and 77146, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
